For the Record - Winter Storage and Spring Recommissioning Checklist

September 10, 2011 • Jack

Archived below is a lengthy checklist for storing Windleblo over the winter and recommissioning her in the spring. Unless you’re into the details of cruising, you may want to skip this post. As with much of our “technical” matters, we’ve stolen shamelessly from lessons learned aboard Mahina Tiare III. Thanks, John. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
